cancellationPolicies.label: Deposit Only rates
cancellationPolicies.description: This property has a 7 day cancellation policy. Failure to cancel within this time will result in a cancellation charge equal to the first night of your stay, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information).

dorms.name: Standard 6 Bed Mixed Dorm
dorms.description: Dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer mixed accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription: 6 Bed Mixed Dorm. Each bed comes with privacy curtains, personal power point, reading light and under-bed storage. Room comes with en-suite toilet and shower, TV, fridge, climate control, wifi and towels.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

rateRuleViolationsMessages.description: Requires a minimum of 3 nights stay on your dates

dorms.name: Deluxe 4 Bed Mixed Dorm Ensuite
dorms.description: Dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer mixed accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription: Four Bed Mixed Ensuite. Each bed comes with privacy curtains, personal power point, reading light and under-bed storage. Room comes with en-suite toilet and shower, TV, fridge, climate control, wifi and towels.

privates.name: Deluxe Twin Room Private Ensuite
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: Book a private dorm for the two of you.  Each bed comes with privacy curtains, personal power point, reading light and under-bed storage. Room comes with en-suite toilet and shower, TV, fridge, climate control, wifi and towels.

specialEventConditions.title: No Check in or Outs on Christmas Day
specialEventConditions.description: Hello traveller- please note that any booking that contains a check in or check out on Christmas Day will be cancelled.

freeCancellation.label: Free Cancellation rates
freeCancellation.description: If you cancel your booking before 23:59 21st Dec 2025 (NZDT) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 23:59 21st Dec 2025 (NZDT) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.
